item.title: #en @ 1479998907123863554
item.description: People seem to be redefining Web 2.0 as Facebook, etc, that own data, but Web 2.0 at the time was platforms like WordPress, Odeo, Six Apart, Flickr, Technorati, and https://t.co/vlhR5g6fkg that had open data and interoperated. https://t.co/PXuZBaLbP2 https://t.co/KoDPTdZhN3 https://t.co/sJJT8kyaJG

item.title: #fr @ 1479509630124544000
#en @ 1479498927778906112
item.description:
OpenAlex Tip of the Day
OpenAlex data is free! The API is free, and snapshots are free, including transfer fees.
Initially we passed on the AWS transfer charges to ensure sustainability, but we've since been approved into AWS Open Data program so Amazon is picking up the tab!
